name: The Last Wizard of Bolgrum
description:
Welcome to The Last Wizard of Bolgrum! 

This game was made in 5 days for Weekly Game Jam #149, where the theme was "Last One Left". In this game, you play as the last Dwarven wizard, attempting to travel to the Elven lands to retrieve the crystals that they have stolen, thus draining the magic from the rest of your city. It's up to you to restore your city to it's former glory! Good luck, adventurer.

Sorry for such little content, I didn't quite leave myself enough time to add any more haha. I had a blast making this game, and hope you enjoy!
